For 110 years, farmers have met each January at the Farm Show in  Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. The event is the largest indoor agricultural  exposition in the country, featuring nearly 5,000 animals, more than  250 commercial exhibits, and welcomes more than 500,000 visitors each  year.
